allImageUrls.alt: Bay window with a great view in the master bedroom.

title: Luxurious 2BHK on 24th Floor in Bharatiya city

included: Housekeeping available from 2:00‚ÄØpm to 6:00‚ÄØpm, every day ‚Äì available at extra cost

additionalRules: 1.	Check-In and Check-Out:
‚Ä¢	Check-in: After 2:00 PM
‚Ä¢	Check-out: By 11:00 AM
‚Ä¢	Early check-in/late check-out may be possible upon request.
2.	Quiet Hours:
‚Ä¢	Please observe quiet hours between 10:00 PM and 8:00 AM to respect
our neighbours. (For real)
3.	Cleanliness:
‚Ä¢	Please keep the apartment clean and tidy.
‚Ä¢	Dispose of trash and recycling properly.
4.	Smoking:
‚Ä¢	Smoking is not allowed inside the apartment.
‚Ä¢	If you wish to smoke, please use the balcony.
5.	Pets:
‚Ä¢	Pets are not allowed in the apartment.
‚Ä¢	We appreciate your understanding, as this helps us maintain cleanliness
and comfort for all guests.
6.	Parties and Events:
‚Ä¢	No parties or events are allowed.
‚Ä¢	Only registered guests are allowed to stay overnight.
7.	Respect for Neighbors:
‚Ä¢	Be respectful and courteous to our neighbors.
‚Ä¢	Avoid loud conversations and activities in common areas.
8.	Damages:
‚Ä¢	Report any damages or issues promptly.
‚Ä¢	Guests are responsible for any damages caused during their stay.
9.	Parking:
‚Ä¢	Use the designated parking area if available.
‚Ä¢	Follow all community parking rules and regulations.
10.	Emergency Contact:
‚Ä¢	For emergencies, please contact me immediately via the Airbnb
messaging system or provided contact number.
‚ö†Ô∏è Please note: Any violation of these rules will result in immediate cancellation of the booking without refund.

description.theSpace:
Stay on the 24th floor and wake up to a beautiful city view. The apartment is cozy, clean, and thoughtfully set up ‚Äî perfect for both work and relaxation. It‚Äôs located in one of Bhartiya City‚Äôs most loved gated communities, known for its calm atmosphere, greenery, and wide walking paths. Bhartiya City Mall is right outside for caf√©s, shopping, and groceries. Super close to Manyata Tech Park and just 30 minutes from the airport, it‚Äôs the ideal blend of comfort, convenience, and calm.

Sip tea on the 24th-floor balcony with skyline and greenery views, cook a quick meal in the fully equipped kitchen, or log into meetings with fast Wi-Fi and a work-friendly setup. Evenings are calm, secure, and just steps away from Bhartiya Mall of Bengaluru with caf√©s, restaurants, shopping, groceries, and movies.

Please Note: This is not a place for partying. ‚úåÔ∏è 

‚∏ª

Why Guests Love It

	‚Ä¢	High-rise calm: 24th-floor views of the city and green spaces, quiet and private.
	‚Ä¢	Supremely clean: Professionally maintained with fresh linens, spotless bathrooms, and daily paid upkeep available.
	‚Ä¢	Prime location: Inside Bhartiya City. township, gated and safe, just minutes from Manyata Tech Park and well connected to Kempegowda Airport.
	‚Ä¢	Modern amenities: Kitchen with microwave, stove, refrigerator, kettle, coffee maker, utensils, washer, and Smart TV with streaming.
	‚Ä¢	Work-friendly: High-speed internet, power backup, and a dedicated spot to set up your laptop.
	‚Ä¢	Safe & secure: 24/7 security, elevators, visitor parking, and all township conveniences within reach.
	‚Ä¢	Mall next door: Bhartiya Mall of Bengaluru right across the street for groceries, dining, shopping, and entertainment.


‚∏ª

Getting Around
	‚Ä¢	5‚Äì10 mins to Manyata Tech Park ‚Äî perfect for work trips. üß≥ 
	‚Ä¢	25‚Äì30 mins to Kempegowda International Airport via the expressway. ‚úàÔ∏è 
	‚Ä¢	Well connected to Thanisandra Main Road, & Outer Ring Roadüöä 
	‚Ä¢	Ola, Uber, Rapido, and autos readily available. üöï 
	‚Ä¢	Parking available inside the community with gated access and round-the-clock staff. üÖøÔ∏è 

‚∏ª

Neighborhood Highlights

Shopping & Essentials
	‚Ä¢	Bhartiya Mall (next door): retail, groceries, cinema, restaurants, caf√©s üè¨ 
	‚Ä¢	Local supermarkets, pharmacies, salons, and ATMs within walking distance üèß 

Food & Dining
	‚Ä¢	Starbucks (5‚Äì10 mins)
	‚Ä¢	Bhartiya Mall food court (2 mins)
	‚Ä¢	Popular spots like Truffles, Barbeque Nation, Toscano, Copper Chimney within 10‚Äì15 mins
	‚Ä¢	Plenty of delivery options via Swiggy/ Zomato.
        ‚Ä¢      Food outlets like KFC, McDonald's, Tacobell, BBQ and MTR are right outside of the. apartment.

Bars & Nightlife
	‚Ä¢	Byg Brewski Brewing Company (Hennur Road, 15‚Äì20 mins)
	‚Ä¢	Watson‚Äôs, The Druid Garden, Hammered (10‚Äì20 mins)
	‚Ä¢	Gilly‚Äôs Restobar, Stories Brewery for music and nightlife
        ‚Ä¢      Geist Brewing Co. Hennur. 

Work & Business Hubs
	‚Ä¢	Manyata Tech Park (10 mins)
	‚Ä¢	Kirloskar Business Park & Embassy Tech Village (20‚Äì30 mins)
	‚Ä¢	Easy access to Hebbal and the airport corridor

Recreation & Outdoors
	‚Ä¢	Bhartiya City Central Park ‚Äì landscaped gardens and walking tracks inside township
	‚Ä¢	Lumbini Gardens at Nagawara Lake (15 mins)
	‚Ä¢	Elements Mall & Orion East Mall (short drive)
       ‚Ä¢       PVR Inox is in front of the apartment as well.

‚∏ª

Location Highlights üåü
	‚Ä¢	Bhartiya Mall of Bengaluru: shopping, dining, groceries, cinema. 
	‚Ä¢	Manyata Tech Park: short, stress-free commute for business travelers.
	‚Ä¢	Easy airport access: direct road to Kempegowda International Airport.
	‚Ä¢	Caf√©s, gyms, supermarkets, and parks all within the planned township.
‚∏ª

Good to Know
	‚Ä¢	Easy self check-in with detailed instructions.
	‚Ä¢	No parties or loud music; please respect quiet hours.
	‚Ä¢	Smoking only on the balcony.
	‚Ä¢	Visitor and parking rules follow Nikoo Homes guidelines (shared after booking).
	‚Ä¢	Full power backup and elevators available.

‚∏ª

Thoughtful Extras
	‚Ä¢	Fresh linens, towels, hairdryer and iron provided.
	‚Ä¢	Housekeeping available on request for long stays.

‚∏ª

‚≠ê A modern, safe, and peaceful stay in North Bangalore ‚Äî ideal for families, business travelers, and long-term guests who want everything at their doorstep.
description.guestAccess:
This is not a shared apartment. This is a full 2bhk. 

Guests will have full access to the apartment, including both bedrooms, living room, kitchen, and the two beautiful bay windows. You can also enjoy the high-rise views, secure parking, 24/7 gated entry, landscaped common areas, and walking paths within the community. It‚Äôs a safe, peaceful space to relax and feel at home.
description.otherThingsToNote:
‚Ä¢Check-in Requirement: As per Indian law, all guests must provide a valid government-issued ID (front and back) after booking.
	‚Ä¢Residential Community: Nikoo Homes is a family-friendly, peaceful township. Please avoid parties, loud music, or large gatherings.
	‚Ä¢Smoking Policy: Smoking is allowed only on the balcony.
	‚Ä¢Connectivity: Wi-Fi is strong and reliable for work and streaming.
	‚Ä¢Home Care: Please treat the apartment with care. Damages or rule violations may result in additional charges.
	‚Ä¢Guest Comfort: This space is thoughtfully designed for families, couples, and business travelers. Please treat it with respect.

bio: Bangalore is home, and I love making it feel like home for my guests too. I keep things simple: a clean space, a smooth check-in, and a stay that feels easy and relaxed. When I‚Äôm not hosting, you‚Äôll probably find me exploring new caf√©s or catching city sunsets‚Äîtwo things I highly recommend while you‚Äôre here!
host_information.name: Arvind

booking_and_availability.cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation before 2:00‚ÄØpm on 28 Oct. Cancel before check-in on 2 Nov for a partial refund.
